price: (29) And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul,[675] then fall down to him in prostration."
arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
footnotes: [675]- The element of life and soul which Allāh created for that body, not His own spirit or part of Himself (as some mistakenly believe).

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fīhi min rūḥī faqaʿū lahu sājidīna
